sub_topic: Identifying the maximum independent set in a graph.
message_1:
Consider the following graph:

```
   A----B
   |    |
   C----D----E
```

What is the size of the maximum independent set in this graph?
message_2: The maximum independent set in this graph is 3. One possible maximum independent set is {A, D, E}. Another possible maximum independent set is {B, C, E}. In both cases, no two vertices in the set are adjacent.
